channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Our Other Islands
channel.desc: Troy is embraced by the people who fought for Matakana island as it stands today and who are planting the seeds for what it could be tomorrow. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Wairua (Mts)
channel.desc: The topic of wairua will be covered and the question will be answered from a M?ori perspective of ancient times, through to the present. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Queer And Here Series 2
channel.desc: Kruze Tangira is a netball national champion and a sports commentator for Te Karere. As the world becomes more inclusive can the same be said for sports within Aotearoa? (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T? Tonu ? Still Standing
channel.desc: Zane Wedding, a world-class tree climber, finds himself torn between his dream of becoming a champion and his duty to protect ancient trees and vulnerable communi􀆟es.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Here the Wild Things Are
channel.desc: A global race to discover the weird and wonderful wild hidden in our city streets. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ahik?roa
channel.desc: Kuini breaks all of the rules and drags Kid along with her. Te Ururangi asks Haki to help her with a haka and Geo's relationship is on the rocks. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Breaking Silence
channel.desc: Investigating the systemic failings of the Family Court for New Zealanders in the context of women and children fleeing a violent partner. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Breaking Silence
channel.desc: Trinity was 16 when she was murdered. Her mother Margaret shares Trinity?s story with the hope of helping others. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: K Rd Chronicles
channel.desc: A look at homelessness from the inside. Six and Sammy reminisce about the times they spent together living on the streets as they revisit their old haunts. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: K Rd Chronicles
channel.desc: A look at homelessness from the inside. This episode explores the unique problems Covid-19 posed for both the homeless community and those seeking to help them. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Not Even
channel.desc: Ma agrees to have dinner with Henare's sister. Taaps tries to connect with Heps but is kept at a distance. T?whiti reveals his plans for his next protest. (R).

channel.title: Tautohetohe
channel.desc: M?ori wordplay and wit in action as two teams go head-to-head on a given topic. (R).

channel.desc: Mihi is worried about missing out on delicious Kumara! Wai starts to feel uneasy as if something is wrong. She asks Mihi if she can hear drumming. Suddenly, the Farmers appear! The girls hide and watch as they leave the village. It's too early for the feast to be finished. (R).

channel.desc: The girls arrive home but the village is eerily quiet. Wai is uneasy and sends Mihi to the eel rack. Mihi stumbles upon Kuia, who has collapsed in the middle of the path. Kuia and Mihi have an emotional goodbye. Elsewhere, Wai is horrified by what she finds in the wharekai.

channel.desc: Wai is grief-stricken in the wharekai before she remembers Mihi and Ngaru. Wai and Mihi andNgaru are ushered by the spirits into the forest. From there they will never forget their home, and as their people have always done, they too will carry on..

channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and education K?hungahunga and Kura Tuatahi audiences. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora Kura Tuatahi
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and educating Kura Tuatahi.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ng? K?tiro O Taranaki
channel.desc: The girls arrive home but the village is eerily quiet. Wai is uneasy and sends Mihi to the eel rack. Mihi stumbles upon Kuia, who has collapsed in the middle of the path. Kuia and Mihi have an emotional goodbye. Elsewhere, Wai is horrified by what she finds in the wharekai. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ng? K?tiro O Taranaki
channel.desc: Wai is grief-stricken in the wharekai before she remembers Mihi and Ngaru. Wai and Mihi andNgaru are ushered by the spirits into the forest. From there they will never forget their home, and as their people have always done, they too will carry on... (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Huhu - Te Tunga R?kau
channel.desc: Huhu is a show for preschoolders, featuring reo M?ori stories and highlighting M?ori perspectives. 6 tapes.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Huhu - Te Tunga R?kau
channel.desc: Huhu is a show for preschoolders, featuring reo M?ori stories and highlighting M?ori perspectives. 6 tapes.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: After a deep sleep, Kura and Josh wake up to find Rangi gone. Fearing the worst, they begin to search for clues. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: While Kura, Josh and Kazumi follow a trail of maero footprints, Rangi is playing games with rangatira o patupaiarehe on top of the misty maunga. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: With the maero no longer a threat, Kura invites Ruiha to join them on the journey up the maunga to find the godstick and hopefully Rangi too. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Pamu Kumara
channel.desc: Tai and her superhuman wh?nau run their local vege shop from their k?mara farm. The tupu are dying and Tai pushes past her fear of her matakitetanga. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Pamu Kumara
channel.desc: Tai and her superhuman wh?nau run their local vege shop from their k?mara farm. The kids prank Grace to leave their farm. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Pamu Kumara
channel.desc: Tai and her superhuman wh?nau run their local vege shop from their k?mara farm. Tai tries to figure out why the tupu are still dying. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and education K?hungahunga and Kura Tuatahi audiences. (R).

channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and education K?hungahunga and Kura Tuatahi audiences. (R).

channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and education K?hungahunga and Kura Tuatahi audiences. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: West Coasters
channel.desc: The spotlight shines brightly on the remarkable w?hine of Te Tai o Poutini. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Hui
channel.desc: A compelling mix of current affairs investigations, human interest and arts and culture stories. Made with the support of Te M?ngai P?ho and NZ on Air.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: 1.5 Degrees
channel.desc: Exploring the impact of climate change from the perspective of Rangatahi M?ori. Wellington City Councillor Tamatha wants to make meaningful change from the inside. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kids Dont Come With A Manual
channel.desc: Rhandell and Jorian have a beautiful blended wh?nau with some co-parenting challenges, but they are determined to raise their tamariki in te reo M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Ao with Moana
channel.desc: Current affairs series that puts a M?ori lens on issues that distinguishes it from other current affairs programmes.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mana Moana Mana Tangata
channel.desc: The story of how the M?ori fishing industry was saved is a universal one. It's a testament to M?ori tenacity and the good old David versus Goliath battle, fought in the oceans and around the board table.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tapuwae Leave Only Footprints
channel.desc: Pio Terei is on a journey to discover M?ori and Hawaiian indigenous connections through tourism. In this episode we visit Haku Maui, Native Intelligence and Tegan Yorwarth surfs in Raglan. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waka Huia
channel.desc: Iconic archival series documenting the unique stories and histories of M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Whakaata M?ori
channel.desc: Whakaata M?ori specialises in the stories of Aotearoa. Be entertained and informed with news, current affairs, sports, drama, documentaries and much more.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kori Club
channel.desc: Kori Club is a captivating series for 0-8-year-olds that marries the charm of "The Wiggles" with the magic of Te Ao M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?hura
channel.desc: Niua and Hura travel to Whang?rei to uncover the story behind the sacred waters ?tuihau. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Takaro Tribe
channel.desc: Ta?karo Tribe is an animated series for 0-6 year olds. We follow our cute characters as they enter the magical Alphabet Forest where our talking Papa Ra?kau, Pond Koka?, Pu and Waea Wao live. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Darwin and Newts
channel.desc: An animated series for youngsters who love to figure out how things work. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: With the maero no longer a threat, Kura invites Ruiha to join them on the journey up the maunga to find the godstick and hopefully Rangi too. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te N?tube
channel.desc: Two clever cousins, Atareta and Te Haakura, share their world with their followers. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kia Mau
channel.desc: A fun sing-along M?ori performing arts series for children. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tamariki Haka
channel.desc: Children from kura across the country showcase their haka skills. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mataora Digital
channel.desc: Amazing content curated for rangatahi, wh?nau and pakeke. Made by the Mataora team. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: P?kana 2025
channel.desc: Te Reo M?ori entertainment programme for Kura and Kura Kaupapa tamariki / taiohi.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: ?paki
channel.desc: P?nia Papa uses games, music and activities to teach M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?ku Reo
channel.desc: Professor John Moorfield's M?ori language course supported by an interactive website. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Chatham Islanders
channel.desc: These remote islands have a profoundly beautiful and devastatingly sad history that is still felt today. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Ao with Moana
channel.desc: Current affairs series that puts a M?ori lens on issues that distinguishes it from other current affairs programmes. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: H?kina Te M?nuka
channel.desc: As the OCD cleaner of the whare, Whaea Hinemoa isn't happy with the wh?nau. M?m? Jaz tells how she pronounced te reo M?ori, when she attended kura. A glimpse into the life the wh?nau once lived. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Hui Hoppers
channel.desc: It's a battle on the court with Ng?ti Mangopare sending their best ballers to represent the marae. (R).

channel.title: Mana Moana Mana Tangata
channel.desc: The story of how the M?ori fishing industry was saved is a universal one. It's a testament to M?ori tenacity and the good old David versus Goliath battle, fought in the oceans and around the board table. (R).

channel.title: Tagata Pasifika 2025
channel.desc: The show made by Pacific people, for Pacific people - The Pacific voice on New Zealand television since 1987. (R).

channel.title: Whare Takataka
channel.desc: P?p? Tei Nohotima shares waiata and karakia using a range of M?ori tools and movement. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Chatham Islanders
channel.desc: Looking after the land and sea as well as each other is an essential part of life for the islanders. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Marae
channel.desc: Your way into the M?ori world. M?iatanga, Whanaungatanga, Manaakitanga - We bring you stories with heart.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Moon Tide Fishing
channel.desc: Presenter Nore Martin shows when and where to fish according to the M?ori lunar calendar. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Native Ride
channel.desc: A handful of unforgettable M?ori characters stride out on a 100-day quest to tame a totally wild Ruatahuna horse for a grand competition in this stunning and poignant series. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tales From Zambia
channel.desc: Explore Zambia's diverse wildlife, from majestic elephants to playful baboons, through this captivating collection. Venture into breathtaking habitats and witness fascinating animal behaviours.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Michif Country
channel.desc: A glimpse into the St. Laurent M?tis nation on Lake Manitoba, taking viewers on a journey with the most active and talented hunters, trappers, and fishermen in the community.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Hunting Aotearoa
channel.desc: Join skilled hunter-gatherer Peter Peeti, for another exciting hunting season. Pete is in the Tasman region, with a group of teenagers who are learning how to hunt and provide for their families. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Only In Aotearoa
channel.desc: Short and sharp comedy skits from a M?ori perspective. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: East Coast Rising
channel.desc: The community comes together for the tangi of East Coast legend Ben Kaiwai. They also rally together for the next generation to provide lunches to the local kura. (R).
